## Load Packages
Before reading and summarizing the data, some necessary packages must be loaded.
```{r}
# Install and load the required packages
library(httr)
library(jsonlite)
library(dplyr)

# Define the function to get API info and return a tibble
API_weather_info <- function(latitude, longitude) {
  params <- list(
    latitude = latitude,
    longitude = longitude,
    current = "temperature_2m,wind_speed_10m",
    hourly = "temperature_2m,relative_humidity_2m,wind_speed_10m",
    timezone = "auto"
  )
  base <- "https://api.open-meteo.com/v1/forecast"
  get_info <- GET(base, query = params)
  get_info_text <- content(get_info, as = "text", encoding = "UTF-8")
  get_info_json <- fromJSON(get_info_text, flatten = TRUE)
  get_info_df <- as.data.frame(get_info_json)
  get_info_tbl <- as_tibble(get_info_df)
  return(get_info_tbl)
}

# Example usage: Fetch weather data for Berlin, Germany
weather_data_tbl <- API_weather_info(52.52, 13.41)

# Print the resulting tibble
print(weather_data_tbl)

```
